column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This place had exceeded my expectations considering how busy it was. Our food arrived very quickly
column2: the empanada was nice and flaky. The calamari was great and the short ribs were fall apart tender. My favorite was the seafood paella though
column3: it was a ton of food....the shrimp & scallops were very fresh. Highly recommend this spot!
